sections.heading: All mortgages shall be foreclosed in equity
sections.text: In a mortgage foreclosure action, the court shall sever for separate trial all counterclaims against the foreclosing mortgagee. The foreclosure claim shall, if tried, be tried to the court without a jury.History.—RS 1987; GS 2501; RGS 3844; CGL 5747; s. 7

sections.heading: For the purposes of ss. 702.07 and 702
